title: Novel Drosophila Models for Neurodegenerative Disease Studies
description: Development of transgenic Drosophila lines expressing key proteins implicated in Parkinson's and Alzheimer's diseases to facilitate high-throughput screening of potential therapeutic compounds.
researchers: Prof. Abolaji A, Dr. Omotuyi IO, Dr. Oyeleye SI

title: Protective Effects of Nigerian Medicinal Plants Against Neuroinflammation
description: Investigation of anti-inflammatory properties of selected Nigerian medicinal plant extracts in cellular and animal models of neuroinflammation, with focus on microglia activation pathways.
researchers: Prof. Abolaji A, Dr. Adedara IO, Dr. Farombi EO

title: Biomarkers of Environmental Toxin Exposure in Agricultural Communities
description: Identification and validation of biochemical markers for detecting exposure to agrochemicals in farming communities, with emphasis on developing accessible diagnostic tools for resource-limited settings.
researchers: Prof. Abolaji A, Dr. Ajayi BO, Dr. Khalil AA

title: Mitochondrial Dysfunction in Age-Related Cognitive Decline
description: Investigation of the relationship between mitochondrial function, oxidative stress, and cognitive performance in aging populations, with the goal of identifying potential intervention targets.
researchers: Prof. Abolaji A, Dr. Smith J, Prof. Williams R

title: Neuroprotective Mechanisms of Kolaviron Against Oxidative Stress
description: Detailed characterization of the molecular pathways through which kolaviron, a biflavonoid from Garcinia kola, protects against oxidative stress-induced neuronal damage.
researchers: Prof. Abolaji A, Dr. Adeleye AO, Prof. Rocha JBT
